text: Abdul Basit is a retired Pakistani diplomat who served as the former high commissioner of Pakistan to India. He was appointed to his position in 2014 and was based at the Pakistani High Commission in New Delhi. Previously, he served as Pakistan's ambassador to Germany from May 2012 to March 2014. During his career, he has been posted at Moscow, New York, Sana'a, Geneva and London. == Controversies == Abdul Basit was mocked by Porn star Johnny Sins as Basit had shared photograph from movie of Sins mistaking him as Kashmiri protester. ==References== Category:Ambassadors of Pakistan to Germany Category:High Commissioners of Pakistan to India Category:Pakistani expatriates in Russia Category:Pakistani expatriates in the United States Category:Pakistani expatriates in Yemen Category:Pakistani expatriates in Switzerland Category:Pakistani expatriates in England Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Quaid-i-Azam University alumni
title: Abdul Basit (diplomat)
